action.info.attack.en: make an attack with this unit. Select the unit and tap any of the RED targets if you want to attack
action.info.attack.->: bu birimle saldırıya geçmek. Birimi seç ve saldırmak istersen herhangi bir KIRMIZI hedefe tıkla

action.info.capture2.en: capture this city. Cities generate stars every turn that you can use to develop your empire
action.info.capture2.->: bu şehri ele geçirmek. Şehirler her sırada yıldız üretirler ve sen de imparatorluğunu geliştirebilirsin

action.info.endturn.en: end this turn to get more resources and unit moves. Press the 'Next Turn' button
action.info.endturn.->: sıranı bitirmek ve daha çok kaynak ve hareket hakkı kazanmak. 'Sonraki'ye tıkla

action.info.move.en: move this unit. Select the unit and tap any of the BLUE targets
action.info.move.->: bu birimi hareket ettirmek. Birimi seç ve herhangi bir MAVİ hedefe tıkla

action.info.reward.population.en: That will increase the population of the nearest city. When the population becomes big enough the city will level up and produce more resources
action.info.reward.population.->: Bu, en yakındaki şehrin nüfusunu artıracak. Nüfus yeterince büyük olunca şehir yükselecek ve daha çok kaynak üretecek

action.info.reward.resources.en: That will give you an instant reward of {0} resources
action.info.reward.resources.->: Bu, sana {0} kaynaklı hazır bir ödül verecek

action.info.train.en: train a unit in this city. Units can be used to explore the world and to attack enemies and defend your cities
action.info.train.->: şehirde bir birim eğitmek. Birimler dünyayı keşfetmek ve şehirlerini korumak için düşmanlara saldırmak için kullanılabilir.

actionbox.building.decomposing.info.en: This improvement will decompose at the end of this turn

actionbox.building.requiredtech.en: You need to research {0} to do this, tap the 'Tech Tree' button.
actionbox.building.requiredtech.->: Bunu yapman için {0} teknolojisini açman gerek, 'Teknoloji Ağacı' butonuna tıklayın.

actionbox.cantperformaction.description.en: You cannot perform this action right now.

actionbox.confirm.info.en: Are you sure you want to do this?

actionbox.confirm.info.breakpeace.en: Are you sure you want to break the peace treaty? Doing so will disable all your units for the rest of this turn.

actionbox.confirm.info.breakpeace.disban.en: It will also disband the {0} units you have in their territory.

actionbox.establishembassynocapital.desc.en: You cannot establish an embassy if the tribe has no capital.

actionbox.insufficientfunds.en: You don't have enough stars to buy this. Tap 'next turn' to get more stars.
actionbox.insufficientfunds.->: Bunu satın alman için yeterli yıldızın yok. 'Sonraki' ye tıklayıp daha fazla yıldız alabilirsin.

actionbox.pendingpeacetreaty.description.en: Peace treaty pending. Waiting for {0} to respond

actionbox.unit.toomany.info.en: This city can't support any more units. Upgrade the city to get more space for units.
actionbox.unit.toomany.info.->: Bu şehir daha çok birimi desteklemiyor. Daha çok birim alanı için şehri yükseltin.

backend.connecting.failed.en: Could not establish a connection to the server

backend.connection.lost.info.en: Hold on while we're trying to reconnect

building.ability.attract.en: Attracts a wild animal to a nearby forest tile every {1} turns.
building.ability.attract.->: her 3 sırada bir hayvanı yakındaki bir orman karesine attracts

building.ability.bridge.en: {0} creates a bridge that any unit can move on, ignoring the terrain type underneath.

building.ability.embark.en: Units that move here will turn into boats that can move on water.
building.ability.embark.->: Buraya gelen birimler tekneye dönüşecek ve suda hareket edebilecekler.

building.ability.heal.en: {0} heals any friendly unit that end their turn next to them.

building.ability.limited.en: You can only build one {0} per city.
building.ability.limited.->: Her şehre sadece bir {0} inşa edilebilir.

building.ability.network.en: {1} connect to cities and other {1} through {0}, within a {2} tiles radius.

building.ability.patina.en: {0} grows every {1} turns and provides {2} for each level of growth.
building.ability.patina.->: {0} zamanla büyür, yani onları mümkün olduğunca erken inşa et.

building.ability.poison.en: {0} poison any unit that step on them. Poisoned units lose all defense bonuses and spread spores when they die.

building.ability.road.en: Build roads to connect cities with the capital. Connected cities get 1 population as a reward. Roads also give a movement bonus for all units.
building.ability.road.->: Şehirleri başkentle bağlamak için yollar inşa edin. Bağlı olan şehirler ödül olarak 1 nüfus kazanırlar. Yollar ayrıca bütün birimlere bir hareket bonusu verir.

building.ability.route.en: {1} creates trade routes through {0} to any other {1} within a {2} tiles radius.
building.ability.route.->: Bu yapı,{0} ile başka bir {1} arasında 5 karelik bir yarıçap içerisinde ticaret yolları oluşturacak.

building.ability.ruin.en: A ruin from an ancient civilization, it can contain valuable things! Go there with a unit to examine it.
building.ability.ruin.->: Antik bir medeniyetten kalan bir harabe, değerli şeyler içerebilir! Bir birim ile oraya git ve onu onar.

building.capital.owner.former.en: {0} is the former capital of the {1} empire, currently occupied by {2} forces
building.capital.owner.former.->: {0}, {1} imparatorluğunun eski başkenti, şu an {2} güçleri tarafından kullanılıyor

building.city.owner.en: {0} is a city in the {1} empire

building.produce.multiply.polaris.en: ({0} for every {1} frozen tiles in the world)

building.produce.multiply2.en: produces {0} for each nearby {1} each turn
building.produce.multiply2.->: her sırada yakınındaki her bir {1} için {0} üretir

building.produce.multiply2.polaris.en: Produces {0} for every {1} frozen tiles in the world
building.produce.multiply2.polaris.->: Dünyadaki her bir {1} donmuş kare için {0} üretir

building.resource.en: adds a {0} at the selected tile

building.restriction.near.en: Must be built next to a {0}.

building.restriction.on.en: Must be on a tile with {0}.

building.village.owner.en: This is a village that doesn't belong to any tribe
building.village.owner.->: Bu köy hiçbir kabileye ait değil

challengermode.connect.description.en: To participate in a ladder you need a Challengermode account.

consent.approval.info.en: To improve Polytopia with usage statistics and to store your high scores and settings we need your approval to access to some personal data. You can read more about what data we collect in our privacy policy. (You can revoke your approval at any time in the 'Throne Room')
consent.approval.info.->: Polytopia'yı kullanım istatikleriyle geliştirmek ve yüksek skorlarınızı ve ayarlarınızı saklamak için, bazı kişisel verilere erişmek için izninize ihtiyacımız var. Ne verisi topladığımız hakkında daha fazla bilgi için gizlilik politikamızı okuyun. (İzninizi 'Taht Odası'nda istediğiniz zaman iptal edebilirsiniz)

consent.disabled.info.en: To save personal data like high scores and usage statistics we need your approval. For more info, read our privacy policy.
consent.disabled.info.->: Yüksek skorlar ve kullanım istatistikleri gibi kişisel verileri kaydetmek için izninize ihtiyacımız var. Daha fazla bilgi için, gizlilik politikamızı okuyun.

consent.enabled.info.en: You currently allow Polytopia to access some personal data to improve service and store your high scores etc. For more info, read our privacy policy.
consent.enabled.info.->: Şu an Polytopia'nın yüksek skorlarını saklamak ve servisleri geliştirmek vb. için bazı kişisel verilere erişmesine izin veriyorsun. Daha fazla bilgi için gizlilik politikamızı okuyun.

credits.learnmore2.en: Check the extensive Wikia database created by the Polytopia community.
credits.learnmore2.->: Polytopia topluluğu tarafından oluşturulan kapsamlı Wikia veri tabanına göz at:

credits.midjiwan.en: The Battle of Polytopia is constantly being created by Midjiwan AB, a tiny indie game studio in Stockholm, Sweden.
credits.midjiwan.->: The Battle of Polytopia sıklıkla İsveç, Stockholm'deki küçük bağımsız oyun stüdyosu olan Midjiwan'da oluşturuluyor.

credits.polytopiamusic2.en: Listen to full length versions of you favourite tribe's soundtrack on Spotify.

diplomacy.acceptpeace.description.en: {0} has accepted your peace treaty! While at peace no hostile actions can be made.

diplomacy.breakpeace.description.en: {0} has broken the peace treaty. Next turn you will be able to attack each other again so get prepared!

diplomacy.breakpeace.notification.descri.en: {0} and {1} are no longer at peace

diplomacy.denypeace.description.en: {0} has rejected the peace treaty you offered.

diplomacy.destroyedembassy.description.en: Your embassy in the {0} capital has been destroyed!

diplomacy.destroyedembassy.description2.en: The {0} embassy in your capital has been destroyed.

diplomacy.establishedembassy.description.en: You have established an embassy in the {0} capital. It will give you both {1} stars per turn, when you have a peace treaty the income is doubled.
{0} established an embassy in your capital. It will give you both {1} stars per turn. The income is doubled if you have a peace treaty.

diplomacy.peacetreaty.description.en: {0} suggests a peace treaty. If you accept you will not be able to attack each other until one of you breaks the treaty

diplomacy.state.hostile.description.en: Your current peace treaty just ended and you will be able to attack each other again next turn.

diplomacy.state.neutral.description.en: There has been no recent hostilities between your tribes.

diplomacy.state.peace.description.en: You currently have a peace treaty preventing you from attacking each other. A peace treaty can be canceled at any time, but that will take effect in the following turn.

diplomacy.state.war.description.en: You or them have attacked the other in the last turn. If there are no more hostilities in one turn your status will change to "neutral"

endscreen.connectioninfo.en: Log in to submit high scores

endscreen.personal.->: Yeni kişisel tüm zamanların yüksek skoru!

error.code.1010.en: Unable to create game, no players ({0})

error.code.1019.en: Your version of Polytopia is too old. Update to the latest version to start a new multiplayer game ({0})

error.code.1023.en: This game is using a newer version of Polytopia, you need to update to the latest version before you can play. ({0})

error.code.1024.en: This game is still ongoing, you can view it once it has ended ({0})

esport.verifyaccount.description.en: You’re about to link your Polytopia account to Challengermode.

esport.verifyaccount.description.login.en: In order to verify your account you need to be logged in

friendlist.friend.notupdated.en: {0} is still on the old server

friendlist.friend.update.en: {0} needs to update to the latest version of Polytopia before you can invite them to new games.
friendlist.friend.update.->: Onları yeni oyunlara davet etmeden önce {0} Polytopia'yı son sürüme güncellemeli.

friendlist.friend.updated.en: {0} is now on the new server

friendlist.friendshipstate.accepted.en: This player is your friend. Lucky you!
friendlist.friendshipstate.accepted.->: Arkadaşlık isteği kabul edildi. İkiniz arkadaşsınız.

friendlist.friendshipstate.none.en: You're not friends with this player. Maybe you would like to be?

friendlist.friendshipstate.receivedreque.en: This player wants to be your friend. Do you accept?
friendlist.friendshipstate.receivedreque.->: Arkadaşlık isteği alındı. Kabul ediyor musun?

friendlist.friendshipstate.sentrequest.en: You've sent a friend request to this player. No response yet. Fingers crossed!
friendlist.friendshipstate.sentrequest.->: Arkadaşlık isteği gönderildi. Karşılık vermesi bekleniyor.

friendlist.loaderror.en: Could not connect to the multiplayer server. Check your internet connection and try again.
friendlist.loaderror.->: Çok oyunculu sunucuya bağlanılamıyor. İnternet bağlantınızı kontrol edip tekrar deneyin.

gameinfo.gameover.en: This game is over, open it to view the final result
gameinfo.gameover.->: Bu oyun bitti, final sonucunu görmek icin aç

gameinfo.nodata.en: There's something wrong with this game, can't show any data for it

gameitem.gameover.en: This game is over, tap to see the end.
gameitem.gameover.->: Bu oyun bitti, sonu görmek icin tıkla.

gameitem.join.en: Join this game or decline the invitation

gameitem.kick.info.en: Do you want to kick {0} out of from this game? A bot will take control of the tribe.
gameitem.kick.info.->: {0}'i oyundan atmak istiyor musun? Bir bot kabilenin kontrolünü alacak.

gameitem.localplayerdead.en: You've been wiped out in this game, still you can spectate.

gameitem.ready.wait.noowner.en: Waiting for the game to start

gameitem.remind.notification.en: We are waiting for you to play in {0}. Come on!!

gameitem.skipturn.info.en: Do you want to skip {0} this turn? Alternatively you can kick this person from the game, letting a bot take control of the tribe.

gameitem.slow.info.en: {0} has {1} to make a move. Send a rude reminder to make {0} hurry up?
gameitem.slow.info.->: {0} oyuncusunun hareket yapması için {1} var. {0}'in hızlı olması için kaba bir hatırlatıcı gönder?

gameitem.start.inviteplayer.en: You need to invite one or more players

gameitem.start.wait.en: Waiting for {0} to start the game

gameitem.timeleft.info.en: {0} still has {1} to make a move.
gameitem.timeleft.info.->: {0}'in hala hareket yapmak için {1} zamanı var.

gameitem.timelimit.info.en: You have {0} to make your move, after that you will be removed from the game.
gameitem.timelimit.info.->: Hareket yapman için {0} var, ondan sonra oyundan kaldırılacaksın.

gameitem.timelimit.timeleft.info.en:
This is the time you have left to make your move. When the time runs out you will be automatically skipped.

You have been skipped {0} times in this game.

After {1} skips you will be kicked from the game.

gameitem.timeup.info.en: Your time to make a move is up, do you want to resign?
gameitem.timeup.info.->: Hamle yapma süren doldu, çekilmek istiyor musun?

gamemode.custom.description.button.en: Set up your own game and play however you like.
gamemode.custom.description.button.->: Kendi oyununu kur ve istediğin şekilde oyna.

gamemode.death.en: Your last city was lost, you have been defeated.

gamemode.domination.description.en: Wipe all the other tribes from the face of the Square. There can be only one.
gamemode.domination.description.->: Savaş meydanındaki bütün kabileleri ortadan kaldır ki sadece senin kabilen hayatta kalsın.

gamemode.domination.description.button.en: Play until there is only one tribe left, with no time limit.
gamemode.domination.description.button.->: Zaman limiti olmadan sadece 1 kabile kalana kadar oyna.

gamemode.domination.loss.en: Your last city was lost, you have been defeated.

gamemode.domination.win.en: You have defeated all the other tribes and unified the entire Square!
gamemode.domination.win.->: Diğer butun kabileleri yok ettin ve meydanın hakimiyetini ele geçirdin!

gamemode.might.description.->: Kazanmak için tüm başkentleri ele geçir

gamemode.might.win.last.human.en: You are the last standing human player, you win!

gamemode.none.description.en: You might get either game mode. Groovy!

gamemode.perfection.description.en: Get the highest possible score before the time runs out.
gamemode.perfection.description.->: Süre bitmeden mümkün olan en yüksek puana sahip ol.

gamemode.perfection.description.button.en: Show your skills on the global hiscore in the classic 30 turns game.
gamemode.perfection.description.button.->: Klasik 30 sıralı oyunda global yüksek puanla hünerlerini göster!

gamemode.perfection.loss.en: We have reached the end of time.

gamemode.perfection.win.en: We have reached the end of time. The memory of your tribe will echo in eternity!
gamemode.perfection.win.->: Sürenin sonuna geldik. Irkın tarih boyunca unutulmayacak!

gamemode.sandbox.description.en: Play however you like, forever and ever

gamemode.tutorial.description.en: Your tribe gift you with these resources. Spend them wisely!

gamesaverbinary.unable.to.save.en: I was unable to save the game, make sure you have sufficient storage on your device
gamesaverbinary.unable.to.save.->: Oyunu kaydedemedim, lütfen cihazında yeterli depolama alanı olduğunu kontrol et.

gamesettings.createslot.error.info.en: Make sure you are online and try again.
gamesettings.createslot.error.info.->: İnternet bağlantını kontrol edip tekrar dene.

gamesettings.disableTribes.->: Kabileleri Etkinleştir veya Devre Dışı Bırak

gamesettings.info.gamepreferences.info.en: The more preferences you apply, the longer you will have to wait to find a matching opponent. So if you are in for a quick game, leave all preferences untouched.

gamesettings.livegame.description.en: Live Games use a dynamic timer that increases based on how many units & cities you have. Any time left at the end of your turn will be added to your next turn.

gamesettings.matchmaking.noedit.en: Open for any kind of game

gamesettings.notenoughplayers.en: You need at least two players to start a game

gamesettings.novalidtribes.info.en: There are no valid tribes available. Enable or unlock at least one Tribe to be able to continue.

gamesettings.online.disabled.info.en: There are some things you need to fix to play online multiplayer
gamesettings.online.disabled.info.->: Çok oyunculu çevrimiçi oynamak için düzeltmen gereken bazı şeyler var

gamesettings.online.info.en: Play with your friends online using our multiplayer server.
gamesettings.online.info.->: Çok oyunculu sunucumuzu kullanarak arkadaşlarınla oyna.

gamesettings.passplay.info.en: Play with your friends offline on this device by passing it around.
gamesettings.passplay.info.->: Arkadaşlarınla tek cihazda çevrimdışı olarak sırayla oynayın.

gamesettings.size.tiles.unspecified.en: You might get any size of a map. Exciting!

gamesettings.timer.description.en:
How long each player has to make their moves.

If a plyers timer runs out others can choose to skip that players turn.

gamesettings.unlockmore.en: Unlock more tribes to play with more opponents
gamesettings.unlockmore.->: Daha çok rakiple oynamak için daha çok kabilenin kilidini açın

highscore.error.en: Failed to upload highscore to server, do you want to retry?

migration.restoredescription.en: If you previously purchased tribes you need to restore them to make them show in this brand new version of Polytopia

misc.failedcommand.en: Failed to send command to server. Do you want to try again?

misc.gameoutofsync.en: Your game failed to sync with the server. Do you want to try again?

misc.pushfailed.en: Failed to handle incoming notification from server

mplayerstats.elo.description.en: The Elo rating system is a method for calculating the relative skill levels of players.

mplayerstats.loaderror.en: Could not connect to the multiplayer server. Check your internet connection and try again.
mplayerstats.loaderror.->: Çok oyunculu sunucuya bağlanılamıyor. İnternet bağlantını kontrol edip tekrar dene.

multiplayer.passplay.info.en: Challenge your friends in a multiplayer match on the same device. Just pass it on to the next player when your turn is done.
multiplayer.passplay.info.->: Arkadaşlarına aynı cihazda çok oyunculu bir maçta meydan oku. Sıran bittiğinde sadece cihazı sonraki oyuncuya ver.

news.description.en:
Welcome!
 This is where we share the latest news from the Polytopia universe. Stay tuned!
news.description.->:
Hoşgeldin!
 Burası Polytopia evreninden en son haberleri paylaştığımız yer. Takipte kalın!

onlineview.friendlist.available.en: Friend List is only available when connected to the server.
onlineview.friendlist.available.->: Arkadaş Listesi sadece sunucuya bağlandığında mevcuttur.

onlineview.game.leavematchmaking.info.en: Are you sure you want to stop waiting for this game?

onlineview.game.old.info.en: This game was created with an outdated version of the game. It can unfortunately not be loaded :( My suggestion is that you delete it and start a new one. Sorry for the inconvenience.
onlineview.game.old.info.->: Bu oyun, oyunun eski bir sürümü ile oluşturulmuş. Ne yazık ki yüklenemez :( Tavsiyem onu silmen ve yenisine başlaman. Rahatsızlık için özür dileriz.

onlineview.game.player.invited.en: You are invited to a new game, {0}

onlineview.game.player.kicked.en: You have been removed from game {0}

onlineview.game.player.left.en: {0} has left the game {1} and has been replaced by a bot.
onlineview.game.player.left.->: {0}, {1} oyunundan ayrıldı,  bir bot onun yerine geçti.

onlineview.game.replays.share.descriptio.en: Use this link to show this replay to your friends or enemies:

onlineview.game.resign.info.en: Are you sure you want to leave this game permanently?
onlineview.game.resign.info.->: Bu oyundan kalıcı olarak ayrılmak istediğinden emin misin?

onlineview.gamedeleted.info.en: The game {0} has been deleted because all other players rejected the game.

onlineview.intro.fix.en:
Hi {0}! 

To play online multiplayer there are a few things you need to fix:
onlineview.intro.fix.->:
Merhaba {0}! 

Çevrimiçi oynamak için düzeltmen gereken bazı şeyler var:

onlineview.intro.update.en: Online multiplayer is not available, please update Polytopia to the latest version
onlineview.intro.update.->: Çevrimiçi çok oyuncu özelliği mevcut değil. Lütfen Polytopia'yı en son sürüme güncelleyin.

onlineview.kicked.automatic.en: You have been automatically kicked from the game {0} since you were auto skipped too many times.

onlineview.kicked.automatic.other.en: {0} was automatically kicked from the game {1} and is now frozen.

onlineview.kicked.info.en: {0} have kicked you from the game {1} since you took too long to finish your turn.

onlineview.loaderror.en: Could not connect to the multiplayer server. Check your internet connection and try again.
onlineview.loaderror.->: Çok oyunculu sunucuya bağlanılamıyor. İnternet bağlantınızı kontrol edip tekrar deneyin.

onlineview.lobby.leave.info.en: Are you sure you want to leave this lobby?

onlineview.lobby.waitingforplayers.warni.en: Not everyone has accepted your invite, do you wish to start the game without them?

onlineview.login.ios.info.en: Using {0} ensures that you have a unique and persistent Player ID that will keep your data safe across devices.
onlineview.login.ios.info.->: {0} kullanmak, oyun verini cihazlar arasında güvenli tutacak benzersiz ve kalıcı bir Oyuncu ID'n olmasını sağlar.

onlineview.login.ios.info2.en: Go to the settings on your device, pick the Game Center section and log in with your Apple ID.

onlineview.login.tesla.info.en: Create a profile in Tesla Arcade to play online with friends

onlineview.nogames.first.en: The first thing you need is to connect with some other humans who play Polytopia. Tap 'Friends' to add them.
onlineview.nogames.first.->: İhtiyacın olan ilk şey Polytopia oynayan diğer insanlarla bağlanmak. Onları eklemek için 'Arkadaşlar' a tıkla.

onlineview.nogames.start.en: Let's get some online games going with your friends. Tap 'New game' to start one.
onlineview.nogames.start.->: Hadi arkadaşlarınla oyun oynayalım. Bir oyun başlatmak için 'Yeni Oyun' a tıkla.

onlineview.noreplays.en: When you have completed a multiplayer game it will show up here so you can watch the replay

onlineview.notifications.info.en: We use notifications to communicate the status of your ongoing multiplayer games.
onlineview.notifications.info.->: Biz bildirimleri devam eden çok oyunculu oyunlarının durumuyla iletişime geçmek için kullanırız.

onlineview.passplay.start.en: Start a local Pass & Play game by tapping 'New Game'
onlineview.passplay.start.->: 'Yeni Oyun' a tıklayarak yerel bir 'Sırayla Oyna' oyunu başlat.

onlineview.profile.available.en: Profile is only available when connected to the server.

onlineview.purchase.info.en: Running an online multiplayer service costs real money and we rely solely on the kind support from players like you.
onlineview.purchase.info.->: Çevrimiçi bir çok oyunculu servisi çalıştırmak, gerçek paraya mâl olur ve biz sizin gibi oyunculardan nazik bir destek bekliyoruz.

onlineview.randommatch.start.en: Start a game with a random opponent

onlineview.replay.delete.info.en: Are you sure you want to delete this replay?

onlineview.resigned.competitive.info.en: {0} resigned from the game {1} and is now frozen.

onlineview.resigned.info.en: {0} resigned from the game {1} and have been replaced by a bot.

onlineview.servicedisabled.en: The multiplayer server is temporarily disabled, please try again later. Also make sure that you are using the latest version of the Battle of Polytopia.
onlineview.servicedisabled.->: Çok oyunculu sunucu geçici olarak devre dışı, lütfen daha sonra tekrar deneyin. Ayrıca Polytopia uygulamasının en son sürümünü kullandığınızdan emin olun.

onlineview.skipped.info.tribe.local.en: You were assigned a random tribe due to inactivity.

onlineview.skipped.info.tribe.other.en: {0} was assigned a random tribe due to inactivity.

onlineview.uptodate.en: All games are up to date

onlineview.uptodate.ladders.en: All ladders are up to date

onlineview.uptodate.replays.en: All replays are up to date

opinion.noopinion.en: They don't know about you yet

opinion.reason.brave.description.en: You fighting against the strongest tribe

opinion.reason.commonrelation.descriptio.en: You share the same friends or enemies

opinion.reason.differentrelation.descrip.en: You are at war with their friends, or have made peace with their enemies

opinion.reason.embassy.description.en: You have good diplomatic connections through your embassies

opinion.reason.like.description.en: For some reason they just seem to like you

opinion.reason.peaceful.description.en: You have not attacked them in a long time

opinion.reason.powerful.description.en: They are impressed by your military power

opinion.reason.threatening.description.en: You have military units near their territory

opinion.reason.weak.description.en: Your army is weak compared to them, you are an easy target

opinion.reason.winning.description.en: You are about to win the game

playerinfo.locked.researchdiplomacy.en: Research Diplomacy to gain more insight.

playerinfo.locked.upgradeembassy.en: Upgrade embassy to gain more insight.

playerinfo.triberelations.popup.peacepea.en: You are both at peace with {1}

playerinfo.triberelations.popup.peacewar.en: {0} has a peace treaty with your enemy {1}

playerinfo.triberelations.popup.warpeace.en: {0} is at war with your ally {1}

playerinfo.triberelations.popup.warwar.d.en: You are both at war with {1}

playerinfo.triberelations.unknown.en: You have not met this tribe yet.

playerinfopopup.passandplay.description.en: A pass and play player. Epic!

playerpickerview.human.info.en: There needs to be at least one human player to start a game
playerpickerview.human.info.->: Oyunu başlatmak için en az bir insan olmalı

polyplayer.task.explorer.description.en: Explore every single tile in this square world

purchasing.error.androidinitializationfa.en: Unable to connect to the Google Play Billing service. This might mean that your Google account is missing or incorrectly set up.

purchasing.error.duplicatetransaction.en: A duplicate transaction error when the transaction has already been completed successfully.

purchasing.error.existingpurchasepending.en: A purchase was already in progress when a new purchase was requested.

purchasing.error.paymentdeclined.en: There was a problem with the payment.

purchasing.error.productunavailable.en: The product is not available to purchase on the store.

purchasing.error.purchasingunavailable.en: The system purchasing feature is unavailable.

purchasing.error.signatureinvalid.en: Signature validation of the purchase's receipt failed.

purchasing.error.unknown.en: Something unknown went wrong with the purchase. Please try again later.

purchasing.error.usercancelled.en: The user opted to cancel rather than proceed with the purchase.

purchasing.restore.error.message.en: Something went wrong while trying to restore your purchases. Please try again later.

push.ended.en: {0} has ended, check to see who won!

push.invited.en: You are invited to a new game, {0}

push.picktribe.en: It is your turn to pick tribe in {0}

push.randommatchready.en: Random match {0} is ready to go!

push.readytostart.en: {0} is ready to start on your command

push.reminder.en: We are waiting for you to play in {0}. Come on!!

push.skipped.en: Your turn in {0} was skipped since you timed out.

settings.language.load.error.info.en: The loaded file does not have a valid JSON Format and can't be parsed.

settings.language.load.info.en: Load a Polytopia language file from a remote server using https. This is an experimental feature, not for the faint hearted.
settings.language.load.info.->: https kullanarak uzak bir sunucudan bir Polytopia dil dosyası yükleyin. Bu özellik deneyseldir, korkaklar için değil.

splashscreen.switch.full.en: The full version of the game includes:

technology.defence.info.en: gives your unit extra strength when defending in {0}
technology.defence.info.->: birimine {0}da savunma yaparken ekstra güç sağlar

technology.intro.en: This tech will enable the following:
technology.intro.->: Bu teknoloji şunları aktif hale getirecek:

technology.requirements.en: You need to research {0} to enable this action.

techview.completed.info.en: You have already researched this technology.

techview.expensive.info.en: You don't have enough stars to buy this. Tap 'next turn' to get more stars.
techview.expensive.info.->: Bunu satın almak için yeterli yıldızın yok. Daha fazla yıldız almak için 'Sonraki'ye tıkla.

techview.info.en: Tech costs increase for each city in your empire.
techview.info.->: Teknoloji ücreti imparatorluğundaki her şehir için artar.

techview.info.literacy.en: Literacy reduces the price of all technologies by {0}%!

techview.locked.info.en: You must research {0} before you can learn {1}.

throne.google.info.en: (!)You need to sign in with Google Play to save your game data and high scores.
throne.google.info.->: (!)Oyun verilerini ve yüksek skorlarını kaydetmek için Google Play ile oturum açman gerek.

throne.google.signedin.en: You are signed in using Google Play

throne.resetwarning.en: Are you sure you want to reset all your saved scores and ratings? This can not be undone.
throne.resetwarning.->: Bütün kayıtlı skorlarını ve derecelerini sıfırlamak istediğinden emin misin? Bu işlem geri alınamaz.

tooltip.ability.agent.en: This unit can be built in enemy territory

tooltip.ability.autofreeze.en: This unit freezes any surrounding tiles and units when moving.

tooltip.ability.boost.en: Give surrounding friendly units a temporary boost in attack and speed.

tooltip.ability.capitalvision.en: Reveals the capital of all tribes you encounter.

tooltip.ability.carry.en: This unit is carrying another unit inside.
tooltip.ability.carry.->: Bu birim, içinde başka bir birim taşımaktadır.

tooltip.ability.convert.en: This unit can convert an enemy to your own tribe by attacking it.
tooltip.ability.convert.->: Bu birim bir düşmana saldırarak onu kendi kabilesine dönüştürebilir.

tooltip.ability.creep.en: This unit does not get any movement penalties in rough terrain.

tooltip.ability.dash.en: This unit can attack after moving if there is an enemy in range.
tooltip.ability.dash.->: Bu birim hareket ettikten sonra eğer çevresinde bir düşman varsa saldırabilir.

tooltip.ability.decompose.en: Decompose any building within your borders and get its full cost in stars back at the end of the turn.

tooltip.ability.destroy.en: Remove any building within your borders, great for reconstructing your empire.
tooltip.ability.destroy.->: Sınırlarındaki herhangi bir binayı kaldır, imparatorluğuna yeniden inşa etmek için harika.

tooltip.ability.detect.en: This unit can detect nearby invisible units.

tooltip.ability.disband.en: Remove any of your own units and get half of its cost in return.
tooltip.ability.disband.->: İstediğin bir birimini kaldır ve ücretinin yarısını geri al.

tooltip.ability.disloyal.en: This unit switches side to the previous ruler when the area they are in is captured

tooltip.ability.dividend.en: Gives 1 star income per peace treaty per turn.

tooltip.ability.eat.en: This unit grows in length for each enemy it kills.

tooltip.ability.embassy.en: Allow construction of Embassies in foreign capitals. Embassies provide income for both parties as long as they are not at war. The income is doubled if you have a peace treaty.

tooltip.ability.escape.en: This unit can move again after attacking.
tooltip.ability.escape.->: Bu birim saldırdıktan sonra hareket edebilir.

tooltip.ability.explode.en: Make your units explode inflicting poison and collateral damage to surrounding enemies.

tooltip.ability.fly.en: This unit can fly over any terrain with no movement penalties or bonuses.
tooltip.ability.fly.->: Bu birim hareket cezaları ve bonusları olmadan tüm arazilerin üstünden uçabilir.

tooltip.ability.fortify.en: This unit gets a defense bonus when defending in its own cities, double bonus with a city wall.
tooltip.ability.fortify.->: Bu birim kendi şehirlerinde savunma yaparken savunma bonusu alır,bir şehir duvarıyla ikili bonus.

tooltip.ability.freeze.en: This unit freezes its enemies when attacking them so they cannot move.
tooltip.ability.freeze.->: Bu birim düşmanlarını saldırırken dondurabilir böylece bir yere hareket edemezler.

tooltip.ability.freezearea.en: This unit can freeze the surrounding tiles including any enemy units.

tooltip.ability.glide.en: All non-skating units get an extra move when moving on ice.
tooltip.ability.glide.->: Paten kaymayan tüm birimler, buz üzerinde hareket ederken ekstra hareket alır.

tooltip.ability.grow.en: This unit will eventually grow and become something else.
tooltip.ability.grow.->: Bu birim sonunda büyüyecek ve başka bir şeye dönüşecek.

tooltip.ability.heal.en: This unit can heal surrounding units.

tooltip.ability.hide.en: This unit hides when it moves, becoming invisible to the enemy.

tooltip.ability.independent.en: This unit does not require any support from its home city.

tooltip.ability.infiltrate.en: This unit can enter enemy cities to incite revolts.

tooltip.ability.literacy.en: Reduce the price of all technologies by {0}%.

tooltip.ability.navigate.en: This unit can move in any terrain even if you do not have the tech needed to move there.
tooltip.ability.navigate.->: Bu birim senin oraya gitmek için gereken teknolojiyi keşfetmediğin yerlere gidebilir.

tooltip.ability.peacetreaty.en:
Send an offer of entering a peace treaty to another tribe. 
You find this function in the 'Tribe Info Screen', click the name of a tribe to get there.

tooltip.ability.persist.en: This unit can keep attacking as long as it completely kills its victims.
tooltip.ability.persist.->: Bu birim çevresindeki tüm düşmanları öldürene kadar saldırmaya devam edebilir.

tooltip.ability.poison.en: Inflicts poison to enemies when attacking. Poisoned units lose all defense bonuses and spread spores when they die.

tooltip.ability.scout.en: This unit has double vision range.
tooltip.ability.scout.->: Bu birimin çift görüş mesafesi vardır.

tooltip.ability.skate.en: This unit gets double movement on ice tiles but on land their movement is limited to 1 tile and all other abilities are disabled.
tooltip.ability.skate.->: Bu birim buz karelerinde çifte hareket alır, ancak karada hareketi 1 kare ile sınırlıdır ve diğer tüm yetenekleri devre dışıdır.

tooltip.ability.sneak.en: This unit can move past enemy units without stopping.
tooltip.ability.sneak.->: Bu birim durmadan düşman birimlerini arkada bırakıp geçebilir .

tooltip.ability.splash.en: This unit causes splash damage to nearby units when attacking.
tooltip.ability.splash.->: Bu birim saldırı sırasında yakındaki birimlere sıçrama hasarına neden olur

tooltip.ability.surprise.en: Enemies don't retaliate when you attack them, even at close range.

tooltip.ability.swim.en: This unit can move on water.
tooltip.ability.swim.->: Bu birim amfibidir ve hem karada hem denizde yürüyebilir.

tooltip.tile.blocked.en: This resource is blocked by an enemy unit
tooltip.tile.blocked.->: Bu kaynak bir düşman birimi tarafından engelleniyor

tooltip.tile.capture.enemy.en: Your city is being captured by the enemy!

tooltip.tile.capture.tip.en: Move a unit here to capture this city!
tooltip.tile.capture.tip.->: Bu şehri ele geçirmek için buraya bir birim getir!

tooltip.tile.explore.en: Explore this area to see what it holds!
tooltip.tile.explore.->: Neler sakladığını görmek için burayı keşfet!

tooltip.tile.extract.convert.en: This resource can be transformed into a unit

tooltip.tile.extract.research.en: You need to research {0} to extract this resource
tooltip.tile.extract.research.->: Bu kaynağı toplaman için {0} teknolojisini araştırman gerek

tooltip.tile.extract.stars.en: Extract this resource to earn stars instantly
tooltip.tile.extract.stars.->: Hemen yıldız kazanmak icin bu kaynağı topla

tooltip.tile.extract.upgrade.en: Extract this resource to upgrade your city
tooltip.tile.extract.upgrade.->: Şehrini yükseltmek için bu kaynağı topla

tooltip.tile.level.polaris.en: Freeze {0} more tiles to reach the next level
tooltip.tile.level.polaris.->: {0} kareyi daha dondur ve sonraki seviyeye geç.

tooltip.tile.limit.en: This city cannot support any more units.
tooltip.tile.limit.->: Bu şehir daha çok birimi desteklemiyor.

tooltip.tile.monuments.en: Monuments give your empire extra score!

tooltip.tile.outside.en: This resource is outside of your empire

tooltip.tile.research.en: You need to research {0} to be able to move here
tooltip.tile.research.->: Buraya hareket etmek için {0} teknolojisini keşfetmen gerek

tooltip.tile.riot.en: There are riots in this city! It produces no income this turn.

tooltip.tile.road.en: Build a road to connect this city to your capital.
tooltip.tile.road.->: Bu şehri başkentine bağlamak için yol inşa et.

tooltip.tile.ruin.en: Move a unit here and examine these ancient ruins.
tooltip.tile.ruin.->: Buraya bir birim getir ve bu antik harabeleri onar.

tooltip.tile.sailing.en: Move a unit here to start sailing!
tooltip.tile.sailing.->: Yelkenciliği başlatmak için buraya bir birim getir!

tooltip.unit.actions.attack.en: Click a red mark to attack!
tooltip.unit.actions.attack.->: Saldırmak için kırmızı bir işarete tıkla!

tooltip.unit.actions.move.en: Click a blue mark to move.
tooltip.unit.actions.move.->: Hareket etmek için mavi bir işarete tıkla.

tooltip.unit.actions.none.en: No actions left. Press 'Next Turn' to move this unit again.

tooltip.unit.city.capture.en: Tap 'Capture' to add this city to your empire
tooltip.unit.city.capture.->: Bu şehri imparatorluğuna eklemek icin 'Ele Geçir'e tıkla

tooltip.unit.city.capture.next.en: This city will be ready to capture next turn
tooltip.unit.city.capture.next.->: Bu şehir sonraki sıra ele geçirilmeye hazır olacak

tooltip.unit.enemy.brokenpeace.en: You can attack this unit next turn.

tooltip.unit.enemy.city.en: This enemy is capturing your city!

tooltip.unit.enemy.territory.en: This enemy is in your territory!

tooltip.unit.grow.now.en: Will grow to {0} at the end of this turn!

tribepicker.categories.specialtribes.des.en: A collection of tribes that are a bit out of this world...
tribepicker.categories.specialtribes.des.->: Bu dünyadan biraz farklı kabilelerin bir koleksiyonu...

tribepicker.disabled.description.en: Tribe disabled, it cannot be used by you or the AI.
tribepicker.disabled.description.->: Kabile devre dışı, sen veya yapay zeka tarafından kullanılamaz.

tribepicker.firstplayer.en: First player must be a human

tribepicker.freetribe.description.en: This tribe is available for free and cannot be purchased to enable online multiplayer.
tribepicker.freetribe.description.->: Bu kabile bedava ve çevrimiçi çok oyuncu oynamayı açmak icin kullanılamaz

tribepicker.underconstruction.descriptio.en: We are still working on inventing this tribe. Growing fruits, developing languages and architecture. That takes time you know. Follow @Midjiwan on Instagram or Twitter and you will be the first to know when new tribes arrive!
tribepicker.underconstruction.descriptio.->: Hala bu kabilenin üzerinde çalışıyoruz. Meyve yetiştirmek, dil ve mimariyi geliştirmek bilirsiniz ki zaman alır. @Midjiwan'ı Instagram veya Twitter' dan takip edin ve yeni gelecek kabilelerden ilk siz haberdar olun!

tribes.aimo.info.en:
The tranquil and wise {0} tribe inhabits the harshest, windiest and highest mountain range of the square, where they have found inner peace by meditating in the eternal evening light. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.aimo.info.->:
Sakin ve bilge {0} kabilesi; sonsuz akşam ışığında meditasyon yaparak iç huzuru buldukları yer olan,meydanın en sert, en rüzgarlı ve en yüksek sıradağlarında yaşıyor. 

{0} oyuna '{1}' teknolojisiyle başlar.

tribes.aquarion.info.en:
From the deep oceans a long lost civilization appears! Their extreme isolation has given them special aquatic abilities that are unknown to the other more normal tribes.

{0} have a slightly different tech tree and have access to the unique amphibious turtle units that no other tribe can train.
tribes.aquarion.info.->:
Derin okyanuslardan uzun ve kayıp bir medeniyet çıktı! Son derece izolasyonları onlara, daha insansı kabilelere tanıdık gelmeyen özel aquatik yetenekler verdi. 

{0} hafiften farklı bir teknoloji ağacına sahiptir ve başka hiç bir kabilenin eğitemeyeceği benzersiz amfibi kaplumbağa birimlere erişimi vardır.

tribes.bardur.info.en:
Surviving the harsh eternal winter of the {0} woods is not an easy task, but {0} seems to thrive here.

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.bardur.info.->:
Sert ve sonsuz kışta hayatta kalmak kolay bir görev değildir, ama {0} burada gelişeceğe benziyor.

{0} oyuna '{1}' teknolojisiyle başlar.

tribes.cymanti.info.en:
The {0} are a breakout group of Polytopians who moved to the swampy forests and learned to live with the Ciru Bug, which attaches to their faces and merges with their brains. 

Led by their Shaman, the {0} train gigantic bugs, use their enemies to fertilize their fungi farms and utilize crippling poisons to vanquish all who would threaten their marshy home!
tribes.cymanti.info.->:
{0} bataklıklı ormanlara gitmiş ve yüzlerine yapışan ve beyinleriyle birleşen Ciru Böceği'yle yaşamayı öğrenmiş, Polytopialı kopmuş bir gruptur. 

Şamanları tarafından yönetilen {0}, kocaman böcekler eğitirler, düşmanlarını mantar ormanlarını gübrelemek için kullanır ve bataklık evlerini tehdit eden herkesi yenmek için sakatlayıcı zehirler kullanırlar.

tribes.elyrion.info.en:
The mysterious {0} defend their woodland homes with colorful magic and the ferocity of fire-breathing dragons! 

They regard Nature as a holy spirit and cannot hunt animals or chop down trees, instead they start the game with the unique Enchantment tech that can turn regular animals into powerful monsters.
tribes.elyrion.info.->:
Gizemli {0} ormanlık evlerini renkli sihirle ve ateş nefesli ejderhaların vahşiliğiyle korurlar.

Onlar doğaya kutsal ruh olarak saygı gösterirler ve hayvan avlayamaz veya ağaç kesemezler, onun yerine onlar oyuna sıradan hayvanları güçlü canavarlara dönüştürebilen benzersiz büyü teknolojisiyle başlar.

tribes.hoodrick.info.en:
The yellow autumn leaves of the {0} woods are perfect hideouts for its peculiar mushroom stuffing inhabitants. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.hoodrick.info.->:
{0} ormanlarının sarı sonbahar yaprakları tuhaf mantar dolduran yerliler için mükemmel saklanma yerleridir. 

{0} oyuna '{1}' teknolojisiyle başlar.

tribes.imperius.info.en:
Huge mountains and green valleys. The {0} climate is perfect for growing fruit. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.imperius.info.->:
Büyük dağlar ve yeşil vadiler. {0} iklimi meyve yetiştirmek için mükemmel. 

{0} oyuna '{1}' teknolojisiyle başlar.

tribes.kickoo.info.en:
White sandy beaches with coconut palms. Abundance of fruit and fish. Welcome to the home of the {0}. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.kickoo.info.->:
Beyaz kumlu plajlar ve palmiye ağaçları. Meyve ve balık zenginliği. {0} kabilesinin evine hoş geldiniz. 

{0} oyuna '{1}' teknolojisiyle başlar.

tribes.luxidoor.info.en:
The {0} love expensive things, jewels, rare spices and exclusive ornaments. That is also why they are the most expensive tribe in Polytopia!

Their citizens lead very comfortable lives, draped in the finest purple silk. But will they survive outside of their beloved capital?  

{0} starts the game with a huge capital.
tribes.luxidoor.info.->:
{0} pahalı şeyleri, mücevherleri, nadir baharatları ve özel süsleri sever. Bu yüzden Polytopia'daki en pahalı kabile bu! 

Kabilenin yerlileri en güzel mor ipeklerle çok rahat bir yaşam sürüyorlar. Peki ya çok sevdikleri başkentlerinin duvarlarının dışında hayatta kalabilecekler mi?  

{0} oyuna büyük duvarlı bir başkentle başlar.

tribes.oumaji.info.en:
The seemingly endless, sun blessed desert is the home of the {0} tribe.

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.oumaji.info.->:
Sonsuz gözüken ve sıcak çöl {0} kabilesinin evidir.

{0} oyuna '{1}' teknolojisiyle başlar.

tribes.polaris.info.en:
The {0} have lain trapped in the far reaches of the freezing tundra for eons, but were blessed by the unknowable Gaami with the power to expand their unnatural icy terrain farther than the weather permits. 

With the might of sleds and Mamoos, the mystical {0} are determined to entomb the Square in ice and transform the land into a frigid paradise. 

{0} starts the game with the ability to freeze surrounding terrain using Moonies.
tribes.polaris.info.->:
{0} donan tundranın uzak bölgelerinde eonlar için tuzağa düştüler, ama bilinmeyen Gaami tarafından buzlu arazilerini hava şartlarından daha çok genişletme gücü ile kutsandılar. 

Kızaklar ve mamutların gücüyle, gizemli {0}'ler tüm meydanı buza gömmeye ve karaları soğuk bir cennete dönüştürmeye kararlılar. 

{0} oyuna Mooni'leri kullanarak çevredeki arazileri dondurma yeteneğiyle başlar.

tribes.quetzali.info.en:
The {0} tribe worship the Bird Gods of the red soil and live in harmony with the natural symmetry of their cubistic jungles. They are commonly seen riding huge flightless birds. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.quetzali.info.->:
{0} kabilesi kırmızı toprakların kuş tanrılarına tapıyorlar ve kübik ormanlarının doğal simetrisi ile uyum içinde yaşıyorlar. Genellikle büyük uçamayan kuşlara binerken görülürler.

{0} oyuna '{1}' teknolojisiyle başlar.

tribes.vengir.info.en:
Frowned upon by the other tribes and pushed into the unpleasant wastelands. Will they tolerate this injustice or rise to fight back?  

{0} start the game with the '{1}' tech and a powerful Swordsman.
tribes.vengir.info.->:
Diğer kabileler tarafından hor görüldü ve tatsız çorak topraklara itildi. Bu adaletsizliğe tahammül edecekler mi yoksa savaşmak için yükselecekler mi?  

{0} oyuna '{1}' teknolojisiyle ve güçlü bir kılıçlı birimle başlar.

tribes.xinxi.info.en:
They start their journey in the dense mountains, surrounded by beautiful cherry blossoms.

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.xinxi.info.->:
Maceralarına kiraz çiçekleriyle çevrili dağlarda başlarlar.

{0} oyuna '{1}' teknolojisiyle başlar.

tribes.yadakk.info.en:
The {0} started out as a nomadic tribe in the beautiful harsh Khalee plains. Now they are the traders of the Square, connecting their empire with impressive trade routes. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.yadakk.info.->:
{0} güzel sert Khalee ovalarında göçmen bir kabile olarak ortaya çıktı. Şu an onlar meydanın tüccarları, etkileyici ticaret yollarıyla imparatorluklarını bağlıyorlar. 

{0} oyuna '{1}' teknolojisiyle başlar.

tribes.zebasi.info.en:
{0} thrive on the warm savannah, cultivating the rich soil to provide food for their mighty population. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.zebasi.info.->:
Sıcak savannalarda gelişen {0}, güçlü topraklarına yiyecek sağlamak için zengin toprakları yetiştiriyor. 

{0} oyuna '{1}' teknolojisiyle başlar.

tribes.zebasi.news.en: All profits from the Zebasi tribe is invested in solar energy projects.
tribes.zebasi.news.->: Zebasi kabilesinden alınan tüm kazançlar güneş enerjisi projelerine yatırılıyor.

tutorial.completed.description.en:
You have now mastered the basic skills to play Polytopia, but there is so much more to discover!
Finish this game by getting the highest possible score before the time runs out.

tutorial.suggestion.description.en: Someone is hiding here in the clouds...

tutorial.task.capturevillage.en: Move your unit to a village and capture it.

tutorial.task.capturevillage.description.en:
Click your unit in the city. The blue markers that appear on the map are places the unit can move to this turn.
After moving the unit you need to end your turn for it to be able to move again.

tutorial.task.endTurn.en: A good first round! End your turn to give your unit new energy.

tutorial.task.endTurn.description.en: Click the 'End Turn' button to give new energy to your units and collect more stars.

tutorial.task.harvestfruit.en: Harvest fruit to grow your city!

tutorial.task.harvestfruit.description.en: Click a fruit tile within the borders of your city and select the 'Harvest Fruit' option. By extracting resources within your borders you can level up your city.

tutorial.task.meetTribe.en: There is another tribe hiding somewhere on the Square. See if you can find them!

tutorial.task.meetTribe.description.en: You are not alone! There are other tribes in this game too and they also try to expand their empires as much as possible. That often leads to conflicts so keep an eye out for your opponents.

tutorial.task.trainunit.en: Train a warrior so we can capture that village.

tutorial.task.trainunit.description.en: Click on your city and select the unit you want to train. Units can be used to explore the map, capture villages and fight your opponents.

tutorial.task.unlockTech.en: Wild animals can be hunted to grow your city even more. Let's research how to hunt!

tutorial.task.unlockTech.description.en: Click the 'Tech Tree' button and the pick the 'Hunting' technology. Now you can hunt wild animals to level up your cities!

updateavatar.description.en: Press the avatar to give birth to a new wild creation

validation.error.steam.en: Failed to validate app through Steam, you need to start the game through Steam to be able to play

versioning.highscores.en: You can't get your score on the highscore list with this version of the game. Update the game if you're after that sweet fame.

versioning.newmatchmaking.en: You have to update the game to start new random matches.

versioning.newmultiplayer.en: You have to update the game to start new multiplayer games.

versioning.unmigrateduser.en: This user has not yet updated to Moonrise

versioning.updateapp.en: We built new cool stuff that unfortunately means this version of the game is no longer playable. Please update to get back into the game!

versioning.updatenetwork.en: You need to update to use network features such as multiplayer, highscores, etc.

wcontroller.building.upgrade.reward.en: {0} upgraded to level {1} and its production has increased +1. You also get to pick an additional reward:
wcontroller.building.upgrade.reward.->: {0}, seviye {1}'e yükseltildi ve üretimi +1 arttı. Ayrıca ek olarak bir ödül daha seçebilirsin:

wcontroller.capital.captured.description.en: You have captured the {0} capital! All their trade connections are cancelled until they regain control of their capital
wcontroller.capital.captured.description.->: {0} başkentini ele geçirdin! Onların bütün ticaret bağlantıları, başkentlerinin kontrollerini yeniden alana kadar iptal edildi

wcontroller.capital.captured2.descriptio.en: {0} is now part of the {1} empire

wcontroller.capital.lost.description.en: Your capital has been captured by the {0} hordes! All your trade connections are cancelled until you regain control of your capital
wcontroller.capital.lost.description.->: Başkentin {0} sürüsü tarafından ele geçirildi! Bütün ticaret bağlantıların, başkentinin kontrolünü yeniden kazanana kadar iptal edildi

wcontroller.capital.regained.description.en: You have regained control of your capital, trade networks are reestablished
wcontroller.capital.regained.description.->: Başkentinin kontrolünü yeniden kazandın, ticaret ağları yeniden kuruldu

wcontroller.convertvillage.description.en: The villagers agree to join your emerging empire!
wcontroller.convertvillage.description.->: Köylüler gelişmekte olan imparatorluğuna katılmayı kabul etti!

wcontroller.examine.explorer.en: You meet some locals who show you the surrounding lands.
wcontroller.examine.explorer.->: Sana çevredeki yerleri gösteren bazı yerliler ile tanıştın.

wcontroller.examine.giant.en: You found a friendly {0} who joined your tribe!
wcontroller.examine.giant.->: Kabilene katılmak isteyen arkadaş canlısı bir {0} buldun!

wcontroller.examine.population.en: You meet a nomadic tribe that settle in your capital!
wcontroller.examine.population.->: Başkentine yerleşmek isteyen göçebe bir kabile ile tanıştın!

wcontroller.examine.stars.en: The ancient ruins are filled with valuable resources!

wcontroller.examine.swordsman.en: You encountered a mighty Swordsman who decided to join your tribe!

wcontroller.examine.tech.en: You found some old scrolls containing the secret of {0}.
wcontroller.examine.tech.->: {0}'in gizemini içeren birkaç eski parşömen buldun!

wcontroller.examine.water.en: You encountered a band of friendly pirates who joined your tribe!
wcontroller.examine.water.->: Kabilene katılmak isteyen arkadaş canlısı bir korsan tayfası buldun!

wcontroller.examine.water.elyrion.en: You encountered an enchanted {0} who joined your tribe!
wcontroller.examine.water.elyrion.->: Kabilene katılan sihirli bir {0} ile karşılaştın!

wcontroller.game.lost.en: You've been wiped out. You can continue to spectate this game or return to main menu.

wcontroller.load.error.en: There is no saved game to resume, start a new game!
wcontroller.load.error.->: Devam edilecek kayıtlı bir oyun yok, yeni bir oyuna başla!

wcontroller.load.notpartof.en: You are not a part of this game

wcontroller.load.update.en: This game is using a newer version of Polytopia, you need to head over to {0} and update it before you can play.
wcontroller.load.update.->: Bu oyun Polytopia'nın daha yeni bir sürümünü kullanıyor, you need to head over to {0} and update it before you can play.

wcontroller.load.wait.en: Wait until this game has fully downloaded before opening it.
wcontroller.load.wait.->: Bu oyunu açmadan önce tam yüklenene kadar bekle.

wcontroller.matchmaking.gamestarted.en: Random match {0} is ready to go!

wcontroller.meet.tribe.bigger.friendly.en: salutes you friendly but pays no attention to your tiny realm.
wcontroller.meet.tribe.bigger.friendly.->: seni dostça selamlıyor ama küçük impatatorluğuna hiç dikkatini vermiyor.

wcontroller.meet.tribe.bigger.hostile.en: laughs at your puny excuse of a Tribe.
wcontroller.meet.tribe.bigger.hostile.->: senin bir kabilenin cılız mazeretlerine gülüyor.

wcontroller.meet.tribe.distant.en: A delegation from a distant land arrives in your capital!

wcontroller.meet.tribe.resource.boost.en: The discovery of this {0} tribe gives you a one time trade boost of {1} stars!

wcontroller.meet.tribe.smaller.friendly.en: bows in awe of your mighty civilization.
wcontroller.meet.tribe.smaller.friendly.->: senin güçlü sayılan medeniyetinin korkusu içinde eğiliyor.

wcontroller.meet.tribe.smaller.hostile.en: seems a bit hostile and greet you suspiciously.
wcontroller.meet.tribe.smaller.hostile.->: biraz düşmanca gözüküyor ve seni şüpheli şekilde selamlıyor.

wcontroller.online.yourturn.description.en: Tap ok to continue the game when you are ready.
wcontroller.online.yourturn.description.->: Hazır olduğunda oyuna devam etmek için Tamam'a bas.

wcontroller.picktribe.notification.en: It's your turn to pick tribe in {0}!

wcontroller.tribe.destroy.all.en: You have destroyed all opposing tribes and unified the entire Square under your command!
wcontroller.tribe.destroy.all.->: Bütün karşı kabileleri yok ettin ve bütün meydanın hakimiyetini ele geçirdin!

wcontroller.turn.error.en: Could not reach the multiplayer server. Please make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again.
wcontroller.turn.error.->: Çok oyunculu sunucuya ulaşılamıyor. Lütfen internete bağlı olduğunuzu kontrol edip tekrar deneyin.

wcontroller.unit.promotion.en: Your unit has gained veteran status! Health increased.

world.attract.sanctuary.en: Your sanctuary has attracted a wild animal!

world.building.capture.ready.en: Will be ready to capture next turn

world.building.capture.warning.en: Capturing will be completed next turn if you don't stop them.
world.building.capture.warning.->: Eğer onları durdurmazsan sonraki sırada ele geçirilecek.

world.intro.text.en: You have been chosen to rule the {0} tribe. Explore the world and expand your empire, but watch out for the other tribes.
world.intro.text.->: {0} kabilesini yönetmek için sen seçildin . Dünyayı keşfet ve imparatorluğunu genişlet, ama diğer kabilelere de dikkat et.

world.rebellion.description.en: A {0} from the {1} tribe has infiltrated the city of {2} and incited a revolt agains you!

world.reward.building.en: You can now construct {0}! This epic monument will bring wealth and glory to the nearest city.
world.reward.building.->: Artık {0} inşa edebilirsin! Bu destansı anıt en yakındaki şehre servet ve güç getirecek.

world.road.connected.message.en: {0} is now connected to your capital!

world.suggestion.disable.en: (These suggestions can be switched off in the menu)

world.tech.new.message.en: You have discovered the secret of {0}

world.turn.nomoves.en: No more moves available, end turn
world.turn.nomoves.->: Daha fazla hareket yapamazsın, sıranı bitir

world.turn.waiting.unknown.en: Waiting for an unknown tribe to play...

world.unit.disembark.message.en: Disembarking this unit will dismantle your {0}. Do you wish to proceed?
world.unit.disembark.message.->: Bu birimi karaya çıkarırsan {0} yok olacak . Devam etmek istediğinden emin misin?

world.unit.evolve.en: Your unit has grown into a {0}!
